attributes.action: make the Home Secretary apologise to the parents of children killed by horse riding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since horse riding has been scientifically shown to be more dangerous than the taking of certain illegal drugs, the Home Secretary should apologise to the parents of children who have been killed whilst horse riding. Given that Parliament has allowed this potentially lethal activity to go unchecked, it is the only honourable thing for the Home Secretary to do.
This is not a humorous matter, it is a matter of life and death, and has a very clear point about government policy.

rejection.details: While we recognise that your petition is not intended to be humorous, we still do not see how this relates to Government policy. If you would like the government to change its policy on horseriding please explain how in the body of your petition.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
